TC_mud.cpp

00001 
00009 #define TO_FILE
00010 #define USE_PRECODER
00011 #define AWGN_CHANNEL
00012 
00013 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00014 #include "SISO.h"//SISO class
00015 #include "EXIT.cpp"//EXIT class
00016 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00017 
00018 using namespace itpp;
00019 using tr::SISO;
00020 using tr::EXIT;
00021 using tr::threshold;
00022 using std::cout;
00023 using std::endl;
00024 using std::string;
00025 
00026 int main(void)
00027 {
00028     //general parameters
00029     vec sigmaA = "0.01:0.1:7";//standard deviation (sqrt(variance)) of the mutual a priori information
00030     string mud_method = "maxlogMAP";
00031     int nb_usr = 8;
00032     double threshold_value = 50;
00033 #ifndef AWGN_CHANNEL
00034     int ch_nb_taps = 4;//number of channel multipaths
00035 #else
00036     int ch_nb_taps = 1;
00037 #endif
00038     int nb_blocks_lim = 25;
00039     int perm_len = itpp::pow2i ( 16 );//int(itpp::pow10(5.0));//permutation length
00040     double EbN0_dB = 8;
00041     double Ec = 1.0;//chip energy
00042     double R = 1.0/16.0;//coding rate
00043 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00044     ivec prec_gen = "03 02";//octal notation
00045     int prec_gen_length = 2;
00046 #endif
00047 
00048     //other parameters
00049     vec sigma2A = sqr(sigmaA);
00050     int sigma2A_len = sigma2A.length();
00051     string filename = "TC_mud_"+mud_method+"_"+to_str(nb_usr)+".it";
00052 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00053     filename = "prec_"+filename;
00054 #endif
00055     filename = "Res/" + filename;
00056     double sigma2 = (0.5*Ec/R)*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00057     bmat chips(nb_usr,perm_len);
00058     vec em(perm_len);
00059     vec rec(perm_len+ch_nb_taps-1);//padding zeros are added
00060     vec apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00061     vec extrinsic_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00062     register int en,u,nb_blocks;
00063 
00064     //precoder
00065 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00066     Rec_Syst_Conv_Code prec;
00067     prec.set_generator_polynomials(prec_gen, prec_gen_length);
00068 #endif
00069 
00070     //SISO MUD
00071     mat mud_apriori_data(nb_usr,perm_len);
00072     mat mud_extrinsic_data;
00073 
00074     //BPSK
00075     BPSK bpsk;
00076 
00077     //AWGN
00078     AWGN_Channel awgn;
00079     awgn.set_noise(sigma2);
00080     //multipath channel impulse response (Rayleigh fading) with real coefficients
00081 #ifndef AWGN_CHANNEL
00082     vec single_ch(ch_nb_taps);
00083     mat ch_imp_response(nb_usr, ch_nb_taps);
00084     vec ini_state = zeros(ch_nb_taps);
00085     MA_Filter<double,double,double> multipath_channel(ini_state);
00086     multipath_channel.set_state(ini_state);//initial state is always 0 due to Zero Padding technique
00087     vec padding_zeros = zeros(ch_nb_taps-1);
00088 #else
00089     mat ch_imp_response = ones ( nb_usr, 1 );
00090 #endif
00091 
00092     //SISO blocks
00093     SISO siso;
00094     siso.set_mud_method(mud_method);
00095     siso.set_noise(sigma2);
00096 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00097     siso.set_precoder_generator(prec_gen(0), prec_gen_length);
00098 #endif
00099 
00100     //EXIT chart
00101     EXIT exit;
00102 
00103     //progress timer
00104     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00105     timer.set_max(sigma2A_len);
00106 
00107     //Randomize generators
00108     RNG_randomize();
00109 
00110     //main loop
00111     timer.progress(0.0);
00112     for (en=0;en<sigma2A_len;en++)
00113     {
00114         apriori_mutual_info(en) = exit.apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A(en));//apriori mutual info
00115         for (nb_blocks=0;nb_blocks<nb_blocks_lim;nb_blocks++)
00116         {
00117             rec.zeros();
00118             for (u=0;u<nb_usr;u++)
00119             {
00120                 //chips generation
00121                 chips.set_row(u, randb(perm_len));
00122 
00123                 //precoder
00124 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00125                 bmat parity_bits;
00126                 prec.encode(chips.get_row(u), parity_bits);
00127                 em = bpsk.modulate_bits(parity_bits.get_col(0));
00128 #else
00129                 //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1)
00130                 em = bpsk.modulate_bits(chips.get_row(u));
00131 #endif
00132 
00133                 //multipath channel
00134 #ifndef AWGN_CHANNEL
00135                 single_ch = randray(ch_nb_taps);
00136                 single_ch /= sqrt(sum_sqr(single_ch));//normalized power profile
00137                 ch_imp_response.set_row(u, single_ch);
00138                 multipath_channel.set_coeffs(ch_imp_response.get_row(u));
00139                 rec += multipath_channel(concat(em, padding_zeros));//Zero Padding
00140 #else
00141                 rec += em;
00142 #endif
00143             }
00144             rec = awgn(rec);
00145 
00146             //a priori information generation
00147             for (u=0;u<nb_usr;u++)
00148             {
00149                 mud_apriori_data.set_row ( u, exit.generate_apriori_info ( chips.get_row ( u ) ) );
00150             }
00151 
00152             //MUD
00153             siso.set_impulse_response ( ch_imp_response );
00154             siso.mud(mud_extrinsic_data, rec, mud_apriori_data);
00155 
00156             //threshold
00157             mud_extrinsic_data = threshold(mud_extrinsic_data, threshold_value);
00158 
00159             //extrinsic mutual info
00160             for (u=0;u<nb_usr;u++)
00161             {
00162                 extrinsic_mutual_info(en) += exit.extrinsic_mutual_info(mud_extrinsic_data.get_row(u), chips.get_row(u));
00163             }
00164 
00165         }
00166 
00167         //mean extrinsic mutual info over all users and all blocks
00168         extrinsic_mutual_info(en) /= (nb_usr*nb_blocks_lim);
00169 
00170         //show progress
00171         timer.progress(1+en);
00172     }
00173     timer.toc_print();
00174 
00175     //save results to file
00176 #ifdef TO_FILE
00177     it_file ff(filename);
00178     ff << Name("IA") << apriori_mutual_info;
00179     ff << Name("IE") << extrinsic_mutual_info;
00180     ff << Name("ch_nb_taps") << ch_nb_taps;
00181     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00182     ff << Name("perm_len") << perm_len;
00183     ff << Name("nb_blocks_lim") << nb_blocks_lim;
00184     ff << Name("R") << R;
00185     ff.close();
00186 #else
00187     cout << apriori_mutual_info << endl;
00188     cout << extrinsic_mutual_info << endl;
00189 #endif
00190 
00191     return 0;
00192 }
